translations.By default, the simulation begins in equ: By default, the simulation begins in equilibrium on Earth in the year 2020, but you can select a different period or planet
translations.You can display radiation flows as eithe: You can display radiation flows as either Waves (qualitative) or Fluxes (quantitative)
translations.Click Play to begin the simulation: Click Play to begin the simulation
translations.To observe how the Earth's climate is im: To observe how the Earth's climate is impacted by different physical conditions, pause the simulation, alter one or more variables, then click Play again
translations.When variables are changed in Fluxes mod: When variables are changed in Fluxes mode, radiation arrows on the canvas will begin blinking, indicating that their energies are projected to change
